casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Harold JOHNSON No. 174P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert H. Johnson, for Johnson, Robert Harold. Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 11th of June 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Watauga County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of June 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of June 2018 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
